channel.title: Project X
channel.description:
Hello everyone, ive started working on a new project (still don't got a name for it). This project will be different from other RSPS using a blank PI and it will be like a custom server. When i say custom i mean that it will have its own bosses-smart npcs(animated+scripted), generally the game it will have a very unique style for example i have coded weapons that when you operate it transforms you into a an npc for melee,ranged and magic for 10 sec or you have the option to go back to normal. While transformed you can't eat,drink or basically do anything all tabs have the option"unmorph" and while you are in this form you have some great bonus according to the form that you transformed. The game will have only main city teleports so players will have the opportunity to explore the game and discover new lairs and such. The game will have custom dungeoneering,hunting as well as construction and summoning.
More over dungeons will be created and as many minigames as possible, such as nazi zombies and such. I have already added 15 custom achievments and 4 custom quests that will give the players another unique experience.
anws, for now this i will be updating this thread very soon with pictures and such for now here is some of my old work(when i used to work with delta 2 years ag0):D http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rczEWxL3llM
